heading: Introduction to C Programming
description: A foundational course that acquaints learners covering topics such as syntax, data types, arrays, functions, and structured computer programs with simulation.

heading: Introduction to Algorithms
description: Students will learn how to develop efficient algorithms, solve complex computational problems, and strategies like sorting, searching, and dynamic programming

heading: Introduction to C++ for DSA
description: This course is essential for individuals pursuing careers in software development and cp career, as it bridges the gap between programming proficiency and algorithmic problem-solving.

heading: Basic Data Structures
description: An introductory course to boost the knowledge on arrays, linked lists, stacks, queues, recursion, tree along with their applications and implementations.

heading: Introduction to OOP Python
description: Participants learn how to create and manipulate objects, classes, inheritance, and encapsulation, gaining a strong foundation in OOP principles.

heading: Software Engineering
description: A comprehensive discipline that encompasses the systematic design, development, testing, maintenance, and management of software systems.

heading: AWS, Cloud Computing
description: A leading provider of cloud computing services that offers a wide array of on-demand computing resources (networking, DBMS, storage, ML)

heading: Database (MySQL)
description: A widely-used open-source relational database management system (RDBMS) known for its reliability and performance. It's designed to store, manage, and retrieve structured data.

heading: Problem-Solving Part
description: A crucial skill across various domains which develop critical thinking ability and enhance efficiency on solving real life problems in any circumstances.
